queue_game.controller

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • queue_game.controller.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Author:
    michal Controller of game. Handles all players actions, verifies them, according to current game phase.
